txt.en: Minda is waiting at Trader's Warf.\n\nYou should talk to Minda Heathertoes.

'You did it, [placeholder]! You ensured not only my continued employment, but every ingredient needed for the feast as well! This will be a grand day of celebration! A light of hope during these dark times!\n\n'The League members here have offered to assist me in assembling a new waggon. I should be on the road home in no time. Thank you, a hundred times, thank you!'
DNT - 'Poor Stomper! Please, find him and my wagon!'

'My dear [placeholder]! A better friend could no one ever ask for!

'Much have you assisted me, but if you would, I have one last request. Heavy are the crates of goods that you have helped me gather. My waggon, however, still lies shattered. The merchants here have told me that we can find the materials needed to build a new waggon in the nearby town of Cotfast.

'I would go myself, but alas, it is full of vicious individuals, and we both know how I'd fare. Please, my friend. Go to Cotfast and collect nails, woodworking tools, wheels, and cut wood. I shall await your return at Traderâ€™s Warf!'
Minda Heathertoes is ready to embark for Bree, but she has one last request before her journey home can be started.
Cotfast is located in the central Wildwood.\n\nMinda Heathertoes has asked you to go to Cotfast to gather supplies with which to repair her waggon.
